lines: Wakatazingwa mu moyo sena? Mwambile Jesu,
Wakatazyingwa mumoyo sena? Mwaambile JeÕs alike.
Mwaambile Jesu, Mwaambile Jesu, Mweenzuma ngo twazyiba
Tokwe mwenzinyoko mbuli Jesu, Mwaambile Jesu alike.
Usisi lanzi Cibi mumoyo, Mwaambile Jesu
Ula penzegwa noyeeya lufu, Mwaambile Jesu
Ulalila bulelo bu boola Mwaambile JesÕ alike.
